Texts.Eng: <There are dozens of pages in this volume, all strange math and bizarre calculations using a numbering scheme completely alien to you. They at first seem like incoherent blabbering until the formula starts to resolve itself almost before your eyes. It appears gives a location in coordinates that match no known sector of space and a blueprint for a

Let it be known that there is no space for us after our end. All that we are, all that we could ever be, belongs to THEM. Prowling about in the spaces between, indifferent to all our petty squabbles. Their nature is the very essence of chaos. They will return one day, and devour the cosmos. Watch the places where all light fades. Watch them well.
weapon to use there, also indecipherable by your current understanding of physics.>
